summary: This is an internal email chain from July 16, 2019, regarding a reporter's inquiry about Jeffrey Epstein. A Daily Beast reporter asks for comment on allegations that Epstein abused a victim while on work release in 2008-09, and whether the SDNY had heard complaints. The internal response indicates they will decline to comment.

keyFacts: A Daily Beast reporter alleges, citing attorney Brad Edwards, that Jeffrey Epstein sexually abused a victim while on work release during his 2008-09 incarceration.
The reporter's inquiry is directed to an official, likely at the Southern District of New York (SDNY), asking if they had heard complaints about Epstein's activities while on work release.
The inquiry suggests these new allegations could factor into the 2019 case, especially regarding Epstein's bail request.
The internal email response indicates the recipient will decline to comment on the reporter's questions.
